AuthorDetails.Name: Adam Werner
AuthorDetails.Description: A full stack developer with a particular focus on .NET development.  An Umbraco Certified Master.

Description: An implementation of the Umbraco IFileSystem connecting your Umbraco Media section to an AWS S3 Storage bucket featuring middleware serving up media files from the `/media` path and ImageSharp image provider/cache.

Screenshots.Caption: Image in the backoffice and its corresponding file in the S3 bucket
Document in the backoffice and its correspnding file in the S3 bucket
Cached images in use and its corresponding file in the S3 bucket
At a glance - Minimum appsettings.json and startup.cs updates required

Title: AWS S3 Media File System Provider
